section.title: Overview
section.para: A new Alternative Roleplaying Area is hereby established in Fleet Six, named Oed V.
Oed V is a planet-based RPG, set on the planet Oed V, near the Vren Border. It is a joint Starfleet-civilian colony consisting of both Starfleet personnel and civilians.
Oed V will remain an active Roleplaying Area, provided that it means the following criteria:

listitem.para: Oed V currenly has a healthy roleplaying environment with a cast of reliable players who remain on the whole within the outlined AWOL guidelines.
Oed V has managed to continue its function as a planet-based environment successfully.

section.para: If Oed V should deviate from the criteria set in this edict at any time, she will be decommissioned.

section.title: Crew Structure
section.para: The Leader of Oed V both In Character and Out of Character is entitled Governor and may be a Starfleet officer or civilian. The Governor of Oed V will be appointed in the same fashion as a normal CO and counts as a CO position toward any limits in place. The Governor has similar powers and responsibilites to a CO. There will also be a Lieutenant Governor of Oed V will be appointed in the same fashion as a normal XO and counts as a XO position toward any limits in place. Oed V is a second-character-only Roleplaying Environment.
